name: Boogie#1 StrawberryField 2021
description:
A painting from the studio, provides the template for the first digitally manipulated gif "StrawberryField" from the series Boogie. Like a domino effect, this series emerges as a coherent sequence, a kind of chain reaction in which the previous work is the starting point for the next. Information is lost, new information is added, similar to our daily lives. Ultimately, the finished series is to be understood as a closed circuit.  
.
